articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Warren: I talk about what's broken and how to fix it
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate, Sen. Elizabeth Warren, discusses the latest round of polling along with her plan for health care.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Team Trump scrambles to turn Soleimani strike into campaign tool
articles.description: As Team Trump scrambles to capitalize politically on the Soleimani airstrike, it's hard not to wonder anew about what motivated Trump's dangerous decision.
articles.content: At roughly this point eight years ago, Donald Trump seemed preoccupied with the idea that President Barack Obama would launch a military confrontation with Iran in order to boost his 2012 re-election campaign prospects. Indeed, the Republican was obsessive on… [+2514 chars]

articles.title: 'I will be there if there is an impeachment trial'
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate Sen. Elizabeth Warren weighs in on a Senate impeachment trial and why she says she will be there if it happens.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Warren: War is not good for anyone
articles.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren discusses how as president she would be getting Iran back to the negotiating table.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Iraq embraces 'no takebacks' rule following US letter on withdrawal
articles.description: The Trump administration delivered a letter to Iraqi officials declaring our intention to withdraw. Now Iraq expects the administration to follow through.
articles.content:
The Trump administration has had more than its share of fiascoes, but the letter to Iraq on the withdrawal of U.S. troops is proving to be one of the most extraordinary. The Associated Press reported:
Iraq’s outgoing prime minister said Tuesday that the Unit… [+2782 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Warren: Not all problems can be solved with military action
articles.description: 2020 Democratic candidate, Sen. Elizabeth Warren, reacts to the killing of Gen. Soleimani and says that Trump has taken the U.S. to the edge of war and that not all problems can be solved with military action.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Why it's so difficult to believe Trump's line that 'all is well'
articles.description: A variety of phrases come to mind when describing the current conditions. "So far, so good!" isn't among them.
articles.content: The day after the U.S. airstrike that killed Iranian Gen. Qassim Soleimani, the U.S. State Department held a special briefing with reporters, whom of whom asked whether the Trump administration expected Iran to respond militarily. No, a senior State Departmen… [+3065 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Lawmakers sign letter demanding answers on Iran strategy
articles.description: Armed Services Committee member, Rep. Jason Crow, D-Col., along with other lawmakers has signed a letter demanding answers from the Trump WH on the killing of Gen. Soleimani. Rep. Crow joins Morning Joe to discuss.
